short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Click Auto login into your Zerodha account in seconds. No hassle!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AuthGenie is a specialized Chrome extension designed exclusively for seamless login to your Zerodha account. This powerful tool automates the process of filling in your Zerodha username, password, and Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) from your TOTP secret, ensuring quick and secure access to your investment portfolio.
